messageBody:
I have some setup operations that need to be executed before running
my tests. I would prefer that these operations run once. (example
sharing a connection for all the tests).

I am currently using static initializers (and some lazy initializing)
instead of TestSetUp.
There are two reasons for this.

- one reason is that I have some setup code that needs to run for all
tests, this happens in the static initializer of a base TestCase
class. The static initializers of the subclasses run setup code for
the suite.

- the other reason is that I want to be able to run individual
TestCases as well as the suites and suites of suites.

The problem is that now I need tearDown functionality .. so am
looking at TestSetUp again. - but don't want to sacrifice the ability
to run an individual test case (particularly for testing my test
code).

- any suggestions?

I realize that the tests should be independent. and they are as much
as possible. but I am also trying to be practical, I am testing ejbs
and database operations.

maybe I should be looking at Cactus? or other .. but need a solution
in the meantime.

--
Jennifer
